articles.title: She was 7 weeks pregnant. She felt her only option was to order abortion pills online - CNN Video
articles.description: A mother in Texas says she turned to an online clinic when she realized her state banned her from getting an abortion. If the Supreme Court overturns Roe v Wade, her experience could become more common.
